oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-07-31 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-07-31 part 1. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring Gloria Mann, the Jayhawks, and the Three Chuckles. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sam "The Man" Taylor; Gloria Mann
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (Alan Freed) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Bern Bennett) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Cloudburst (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Gloria Mann -- Razzle Dazzle (Gloria Mann) -- Alan Freed introduces Gloria Mann -- A Teenage Prayer (Gloria Mann) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- The Camel Rock (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Alan Freed introduces the Jayhawks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Mann, Gloria (Singer); Three Chuckles (Musical group); Henry, Haywood; Melamed, Louis
